personaldata: Electronic and manually processed data. “Personal Information” is defined to mean information or an opinion (including information or an opinion forming part of a database), whether true or not, and whether recorded in a material form or not, about an individual whose identity is apparent, or can reasonably be ascertained, from the information or opinion.
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
